plot: When young Lya goes out into the woods to forget about her sick kid brother, she meets a wounded Pig Troll. She takes him in, unaware that dark forces are after him, and will stop at nothing to get him back!
title: Lya
plot_es: When young Lya goes out into the woods to forget about her sick kid brother, she meets a wounded Pig Troll. She takes him in, unaware that dark forces are after him, and will stop at nothing to get him back!
